text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Disney Black 3d Stitch Silicone Soft Case Cover for Samsung Galaxy Nexus I9250 I515 NEW

Item specifications:
Made with high quality Silicone
Durable Protection
Very Good hand feeling
Compatible with: samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250
Samsung Galaxy Nexus i515
text.Response A:
Color: Black
Material: silicone
Shipping from: Hong Kong
Package: simple

Attention:
Are you looking for a durable protection for your Samsung Galaxy Nexus I9250/ I515?
If yes, then you are in the right place! 
This is a high quality silicone case that will protect your phone from bumps, scratches, and other damages.
Interest:
Made with high quality silicone, it will provide you with a very good hand feeling. It is also durable and will protect your phone for a long time.
Desire:
Compatible with Samsung Galaxy Nexus I9250 and I515, this case is sure to fit your phone perfectly. It is also made from high quality silicone which means it is durable and will last a long time.
Action:
Don't hesitate to place an order! We offer free shipping from Hong Kong and will ship your order within 24 hours. We also have a no questions asked return policy.
If you are not completely satisfied with our product, we will refund your payment in full. So, don't delay, order now!
text.Response B:
Here is a copy written for the item above following the AIDA framework:

Attention:
Disney fans, look no further! This cute 3D Stitch case will surely catch your attention.

Interest:
Not only does it look adorable, it's also made of high quality silicone for maximum durability, with a very good hand feeling. Plus, it's compatible with multiple Samsung Galaxy Nexus models.

Desire:
You want it. You really really want it. You can almost touch it.

Action:
Go for it! You won't regret it.
